name: Boiling Point!
description:
WARNING!
Between working and my personal life I honestly ran out of time to finish up the game. Unfortunately I had a ton of plans for the game I didn't get to implement or polish up or even have the chance to add audio. Also due to having to my time limitations I didn't get to implement my interpretation of the theme although I have a small bit of the multifunction in the game; I know my game wont score high due to this. Once again I didn't get to polish the game but I hope to whoever plays it that you enjoy either way
Also the fullscreen button broke after packaging the game :(

CONTROLS - MOUSE AND KEYBOARD

WASD -Movement
E - Interaction Button
Spacebar -jump
Spacebar pressed twice - use glider (once Unlocked)
Esc / P - Pause/Unpause Game

Mouse - Camera Movement

CONTROLS - CONTROLLER

Left stick - Movement

Right Stick -Camera Movement

Bottom Face button - jump

Bottom Face button twice - use glider (once Unlocked)

Left Face Button - Interaction Button
